meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the September 11, 2024 City Council Meeting
An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32554
agenda_items.description: Authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2023-24 for the maintenance and operation of various departments and activities.

agenda_items.title: Authorize payment of the jury verdict
agenda_items.description: Payment entered against the City in the lawsuit styled Terry Branch v. Willie Rettig, Lamar Lambert and City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit
agenda_items.description: Settlement of the lawsuit styled Mavel Tovar v. City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit
agenda_items.description: Settlement of the lawsuit styled Tenisha Leonard v. City of Dallas and Terrance Joseph Hopkins.

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the execution of the Second Amendment to Revolving Credit Agreement
agenda_items.description: With State Street Bank and Trust Company in support of the City of Dallas, Texas Waterworks and Sewer System Commercial Paper Notes.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a one-year contract for maintenance and support
agenda_items.description: For the GovQA Public Records Request Management Software.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a new seven-year concession contract
agenda_items.description: For food and beverage concessions services at Dallas Love Field Airport.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a new seven-year concession contract
agenda_items.description: For food and beverage concessions services at Dallas Love Field Airport.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the purchase of eight Pre-Conditioned Air units
agenda_items.description: From Northern Air Systems, Inc., sole source for Dallas Love Field.
